name: Rootlings (Iniciados, Mikapuccino, André Santos, Afonso Lage)
name_original: Rootlings (Iniciados, Mikapuccino, André Santos, Afonso Lage)
description:
Grab a friend to help or dare to chaotically control both roots.

Rootlings was originally designed for 2 players, giving room to chaotic fun moments. However, it can also be played solo, by those brave enough who wish to attempt it. Both ways of playing present their own set of challenges, with the main aspect always being coordination, either between players or solo.

HOW TO PLAY
  • [A] Tap to invert 🟢 root moving direction.
  • [L] Tap to push 🟠 root up.

When the roots touch, both the colors and respective moving behaviors switch. Avoid hitting obstacles or going out of bounds. 

Tip: [A] always controls the top root and [L] always controls the bottom root.

DEVELOPED BY
  • Afonso Lage - Game Designer
  • Andre Santos - Programmer & UI
  • Miguel Martinho - Artist
  • Nelson Milheiro - Sound & Music

Developed during the Global Game Jam 2023 (Roots theme) and polished afterward for release. As a team, we participated on-site at Lusofona University from the 3rd to the 5th of February.
